TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RegisteredScriptType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of client script block that is represented by a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The script type indicates when the script is intended to be executed. This can be during page initialization, during page postback, during control startup, and so on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.RegisteredScriptType ClientScriptBlock = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A block of client code that executes one time during initial page rendering. A client script block of this type does not execute during partial-page updates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.RegisteredScriptType ClientScriptInclude = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A client script that executes every time that an asynchronous postback occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.RegisteredScriptType ClientStartupScript = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A client script that is associated with a control that executes when the control starts.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.RegisteredScriptType OnSubmitStatement = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A client script that executes when a page is submitted.
